title: NUML GPA Calculator

creator: Fipnizen
descriptionHtml:
NUML GPA Calculator calculates your SGPA (Semester Grade Point Average) and CGPA (Cumulative Grade Point Average) with real-time details like GP (Grade Point) and grades in each subject or semester.

You can calculate SGPA from this GPA Calculator by just entering obtained marks and credit hours of each subject.

You can calculate CGPA from this GPA Calculator by just entering SGPA and credit hours of each and whole semester.

You can also save your SGPA permanently within the app so that you can import it during the calculation of CGPA.

***Permission(s)***
-> Camera Permission:
App require Camera permission to access the device camera so that registered users can update their display picture which is an optional feature of the app. You can disable this permission from system settings.

***Disclaimer***
-> NUML GPA Calculator in not an official app of the NUML University.
-> If you think we have infringed your intellectual property rights or any other agreement, please contact us through info.fipnizen@gmail.com, we will immediately take the necessary actions quickly as possible.

***Special note***
-> Criteria for calculating GPA is accurate and authentic as provided in NUML website.
-> If you want to give feedback, report a bug, problem or suggest something related to the app, feel free to contact us through e-mail below:
info.fipnizen@gmail.com
descriptionShort: The simplest and accurate SGPA/CGPA Calculator for NUMLians from Fipnizen.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
-> Material UI added.
-> Added support for Android 11 and Android 12.
-> Updated libraries.
-> Improved the overall experience of the app.
-> Fixed some known bugs and crashes.

title: NUML GPA Calculator

creator: Fipnizen
descriptionHtml:
NUML GPA Calculator calculates your SGPA (Semester Grade Point Average) and CGPA (Cumulative Grade Point Average) with real-time details like GP (Grade Point) and grades in each subject or semester. The app is designed specifically for students at the National University of Modern Languages (NUML) in Pakistan.
Students can calculate their SGPA from this GPA Calculator by just entering obtained marks and credit hours of each subject.
Students can calculate their CGPA from this GPA Calculator by just entering SGPA and credit hours of each and whole semester.
Students can also save their SGPA permanently within GPA Calculator so that they can import it during the calculation of CGPA.
The NUML GPA Calculator may also allow students to set goals for their GPA and track their progress over time. GPA is a measure of academic performance that is calculated by dividing the total number of grade points earned by the total number of credit hours attempted. The NUML GPA Calculator allows students to enter their grades and credit hours for each course, and then calculates their overall GPA.
Disclaimer
• NUML GPA Calculator is not an official app of NUML University.
• If you think we have infringed your intellectual property rights or any other agreement, please contact us through info.fipnizen@gmail.com, we will immediately take the necessary actions quickly as possible.
Special note
• Criteria for calculating GPA are accurate and authentic as provided on the NUML website.
• If you want to give feedback, report a bug, problem or suggest something related to the app, feel free to contact us through the e-mail below:
info.fipnizen@gmail.com
descriptionShort: The simplest and accurate SGPA/CGPA Calculator for NUMLians from Fipnizen.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Material UI added.
• Added support for Android 13.
• Users can now label GPA entries with title for their own ease.
• GPA entries will maintain their existence no matter which screen you navigate to.
• Updated libraries for better compatibility.
• Improved the overall experience and GPA calculation flow of the app.
• Fixed a major bug in CGPA calculator.
• Fixed some hidden bugs and crashes.
• Thank you for your support and suggestions.
